name: Cycling through Spice Plantations of Kerala
description:
Kerala, God's Own Country has an endless list of destinations that can easily mesmerize the cyclists. From the traditional spice markets to tongue tickling delicacies, from ancient monuments to modern day magnificence, from aromatic Cardamom hills to silent backwaters, Kerala offers a bucket of pristine destinations to admire the beauty of nature. It is in Kerala, where the nature has been coloured with all the delightful colours.

While cycling around Kerala, one will surely feel that God himself has blessed the place with all the elements of nature, and it has got all the reasons to be called as the "God's Own Country".
